headline: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. Declares Dividends on Preferred Stock
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., February 12, 2025--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) announced that its board of directors has declared the following dividends on its preferred stock payable on April 7, 2025, to preferred shareholders of record at the close of business on March 21, 2025:
